actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study for the establishment of certain bicycle trails.

summary.text: Amends the National Trail System Act to authorize the Secretaries of the Interior, Agriculture, and Transportation to conduct feasibility studies for the establishment of national scenic bicycle trails. Specifies the following routes to be studied: (1) United States Highway Number One from Maine to Florida; (2) United States Highway Number 30 from New Jersey to Oregon; and (3) United States Highway Number 101 from Washington State to California.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study for the establishment of certain bicycle trails.
